```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
file_path <- "All National Parks Visitation 1904-2016.csv"
national_parks_data <- read.csv(file_path)
head(national_parks_data)
```
```{r}

ggplot(national_parks_data, aes(x = Year, fill = Unit.Type)) +
  geom_bar()
```
```{r}
firstYear <- national_parks_data %>%
  filter(Unit.Type == "National Park") %>%
  group_by(Unit.Name) %>%
  filter(Year == min(Year))

#firstYear$Visitors <- factor(firstYear$Visitors)

ggplot(firstYear, aes(y = Visitors, x = YearRaw)) +
  geom_point()

```
```{r}
ParksCreatedPerYear <- firstYear %>%
  group_by(YearRaw) %>%
  summarise(Unique_Parks = n_distinct(Parkname))

print(ParksCreatedPerYear)

max_year <- ParksCreatedPerYear[which.max(ParksCreatedPerYear$Unique_Parks), ]
```

```{r}
cat("The year with the most National Parks first visitor counts is", max_year$YearRaw, ".")
```
